title: Why are we punished for consistently doing well?
body: So i just got the second shard for mastery 6 thresh, but lo and behold not enough essence to unlock him, even if i do open a box its always a skin. is there any way at all around this crap? also, because i got a token i didnt get a box, but why does it count towards having earned a box? this stupid pay wall ruins the satisfaction i get out of plying this game, and probably of others too. Its a shame you sold to that asain company and they have you by the nuts to get profit.
